content: a bunny lovey / comforter for a cute snuggly baby gift using the block stitch for endless colour combinations you will need dk acrylic yarn a light yarn or thread for the facial features stitch marker filling for the head 3 5mm & 4 5mm hooks scissors and needle for finishing concentration level overall a pattern for experienced beginners + straightforward amigurumi construction and a repeatable blanket pattern after the first few rounds blanket size will finish at approx 15x15
